actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide allowanced and reduced governmental rental rates and charges for certain Alaskan employees of executive departments and independent establishments and to exempt such allowances and reductions from taxation under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.

summary.text: Provides allowances and reduced governmental rental rates and charges for certain Alaskan employees of executive departments and independent establishments. Exempts such allowances and reduction from taxation under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to provide allowanced and reduced governmental rental rates and charges for certain Alaskan employees of executive departments and independent establishments and to exempt such allowances and reductions from taxation under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.
